summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5923 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 25, 2nd Plat of West Seattle by the West Seattle Land and Improvement Company, being the alley between California Avenue and 44th Avenue Southwest, from West Massachusetts Street to West Holgate Street; and certain other alleys and streets; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 78271, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
